Body.Content:
Viva insights network metrics computation logic has been updated to better identify connections licensed employees have with unlicensed employees. Moreover, cross-collaboration query compute has been updated to improve protection of the data of end-users who have opted out of Viva Insights.

When this will happen:

General Availability (Worldwide): We will begin rolling out this change in mid-November 2024 and expect to complete by late November 2024.

How this will affect your organization:

As this change begins rolling out, your organization will see the following updates:

  • Changes in network and cross-collaboration query values (Changes were observed to be between 3-5% during testing)

What you need to do to prepare:

This is for your awareness and no action needed from your organization

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Viva Insights' network metrics and cross-collaboration queries have been updated for better connection identification and data protection. Rollout starts mid-November 2024, with minor changes in query values expected. No action is required from organizations.

Title: Updates in computation of network metrics and cross-collaboration metrics in Viva Insights
